body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Berry's Ferry                Berry's Ferry          Berry's Ferry Over 1,400 Cherokee men, women, and children from Peter Hildebrand's detachment spent two bitterly cold weeks camped in this area during the harsh winter of 1838-1839. The story here is a continuation of the one told at Mantle Rock Preserve. Two exhibit panels, 1.2 MB, pdf
title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Berry's Ferry
